page.title: 02A TYPICAL FARM(CONTINUED)
page.content: { FACILITATED BY THE REMOVAL OF HEDGES AND TREES TO MAKE PLOUGHING EASIER AND CONSEQUENTLY LESS EXPENSIVE. {A CHART RELATING LAND USAGE TO CROP {PRODUCTION { }NAME OF CROP ACRES USED ==== == ==== ===== ==== WHEAT 110 BARLEY 108 PEAS 40 BEANS 15 POTATOES 2 THE BEANS,PEAS AND POTATOES ARE ALL USED IN CROP ROTATION.ONCE THEY HAVE BEEN MOVED FROM A FIELD WHEAT OR BARLEY ARE SOWN TO ABSORB THE GOODNESS THAT SUCH CROPS LEAVE. WHEN THE CROPS HAVE BEEN HARVESTED THEY ARE SOLD TO MILL OWNERS AND CORN MERCHANTS.THE E.E.C.GUARANTEE MR MASSEY AN AGREED SUM OF MONEY FOR ANY
